Sentencas: The present work reports a systematic investigation into the structural and electronic features of tetragonal.
Titulo: Structural and Electronic Features of Nb-Doped SrCoO3: Insight from First-Principles Calculations

Sentencas: and cubic structured undoped and Nb-doped SrCoO3 using first-principles calculations.
Titulo: Structural and Electronic Features of Nb-Doped SrCoO3: Insight from First-Principles Calculations

Sentencas: The results suggest that the tetragonal structure is more stable than the cubic structure as a result of the Jahn-Teller distortion effect.
Titulo: Structural and Electronic Features of Nb-Doped SrCoO3: Insight from First-Principles Calculations

Sentencas: In the Nb-Doped SrCoO3 system, the structural analysis reveals a gradual tetragonal-to-cubic transition with Nb-doping.
Titulo: Structural and Electronic Features of Nb-Doped SrCoO3: Insight from First-Principles Calculations

Sentencas: Nb-ions show no occupational preference over Co-sites in the SrCoO3 host structure.
Titulo: Structural and Electronic Features of Nb-Doped SrCoO3: Insight from First-Principles Calculations

Sentencas: Co-ions become more easily reduced by Nb-doping due to the filling of excess electrons from Nb-ions into Co-3d orbitals, thus decreasing the magnetic moment of Co-ions.
Titulo: Structural and Electronic Features of Nb-Doped SrCoO3: Insight from First-Principles Calculations

Sentencas: Furthermore, the rich electronic states at the Fermi level in Nb-doped SrCoO3 enable a high electronic conductivity, making the material suitable for a solid oxide fuel cell cathode material.
Titulo: Structural and Electronic Features of Nb-Doped SrCoO3: Insight from First-Principles Calculations
